instructions.ar: انعطف يميناً حاداً لتبقى على Shibuya Crossing
instructions.da: Drej skarpt til højre videre ved Shibuya Crossing
instructions.de: Scharf rechts weiterfahren an Shibuya Crossing
instructions.en: Make a sharp right at Shibuya Crossing
instructions.eo: Turniĝu ege dekstren ĉe Shibuya Crossing
instructions.es: Gira a la derecha en Shibuya Crossing
instructions.es-ES: Gire a la derecha en Shibuya Crossing
instructions.fi: Jatka jyrkästi oikeaan tielle Shibuya Crossing
instructions.fr: Tourner franchement à droite en Shibuya Crossing
instructions.he: פנה בחדות ימינה כדי להישאר על Shibuya Crossing
instructions.hu: Forduljon élesen jobbra az Shibuya Crossing
instructions.id: Make a sharp right at Shibuya Crossing
instructions.it: Fai una curva stretta a destra al Shibuya Crossing
instructions.my: Shibuya Crossingပေါ်တွင်နေရန် ညာဘက်ထောင့်ချိုးကွေ့ပါ
instructions.no: Sving skarpt til høyre i Shibuya Crossing
instructions.pl: Skręć ostro w prawo na Shibuya Crossing
instructions.pt-BR: Faça uma curva fechada a direita em Shibuya Crossing
instructions.pt-PT: Vire acentuadamente à direita em Shibuya Crossing
instructions.ro: Virați puternic la dreapta la Shibuya Crossing
instructions.ru: Резко поверните направо на Shibuya Crossing
instructions.sl: Zavijte ostro desno na Shibuya Crossing
instructions.tr: Shibuya Crossing konumunda sağa keskin dönüş yap
instructions.uk: Поверніть різко праворуч щоб залишитись на Shibuya Crossing

instructions.yo: Ṣe idasilẹ to dara ni Shibuya Crossing
